thread.title: Stanley and Rachel Johnson to star in River Exe walk show next week - and yes they do mention Brexit

author: Richard Booth
title: Stanley and Rachel Johnson to star in River Exe walk show next week - and yes they do mention Brexit
text:
Richard Booth Head of Content 15:52, 7 DEC 2018 Stanley and Rachel Johnson, Boris’ father and sister, are to star in a TV show walking along the River Exe Get Daily updates directly to your inbox Subscribe Thank you for subscribing See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email
Stanley and Rachel Johnson, Boris’ father and sister, are to star in a TV show walking along the River Exe.
Set on the scenic banks of the 60 mile-long Exe, which flows from Exe Head in west Somerset to Lyme Bay in south Devon, River Walks follows the pair as they discover the area’s culture, wildlife and traditions.
Author and journalist Rachel said it was “no exaggeration” that presenting River Walks was a “life-long dream come true”.
Seventy-eight-year-old Stanley, a writer and former MEP, added: “I’ve grown up in these parts and I’ve never tired of its magic.
“My daughter and I both think the Exe is one of the most beautiful rivers in the whole country.”
It is also a walk back in time for the pair as they retrace old family memories around the farm that Stanley’s parents bought close to the river in 1951. Stanley and Rachel Johnson, Boris’ father and sister, are to star in a TV show walking along the River Exe
Rachel takes the viewer back to an idyllic childhood, capering along the river with her brothers, including former Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson.
But the pair manage to avoid mentioning Brexit until the final minutes of the show. Read More
